page.title: 09Glympton Park
page.content: A man called Mr Towler owns Glympton Village.In front of his house there is part of a large beautiful lake.All around the lake there is Glympton Park.It is all a green lawn kept in very good condition.On the edge of the lawn there is a little wood.On the edge of the lake there are a few trees and lots of wild flowers. Sometimes we go fishing in the lake.First we knock on Mr Towlers door and ask his permission.We fish for pike and trout mainly.You don't have to ask permission to go into the park.
